validation.moreThenZeroGram: Has to be more than 0 g
validation.moreThenZeroNumber: Number has to be bigger then 0

diary.title: Diary
diary.adjustIngredientsHint1: Adjustments will affect this diary entry. The recipe itself will not be changed.

foods.title: Foods
foods.deleteDialogReferencedRecipesHint_one: {{foodName}} is still used in a recipe. If you delete the food, it will be removed from that recipe.
foods.deleteDialogReferencedRecipesHint_other: {{foodName}} is still used in some recipes. If you delete the food, it will be removed from those recipes.

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.addIngredientFoodAlreadyAddedHint: The food {{foodName}} is already part of the recipe. Do you want to add it again?
recipes.deleteFoodFromRecipeDialogHint: Do you want to delete {{foodName}} from the recipe {{recipeName}}?
recipes.howManyPortionsPerRecipe: How many portions does this recipe make?

settings.title: Settings
settings.importDataDialogHint: Do you want to import data? This will overwrite the current data and cannot be undone.
settings.persistenceHint1: Nutrition-Tracker intentionally doesn't persist any data on any server. Everything is only persisted locally in your browser. However, this comes with the risk of loosing data, for example when the webapp wasn't used for a longer period of time or you're deleting your browser history or cookies.
settings.persistenceHint2: You can allow Nutrition-Tracker to store data locally in your browser for a long term.
settings.persistenceHint3: However, this also is not a guarantee. It's strongly encouraged to regularly backup your data. To create a backup you can download your data and import it later if needed. This way, you can also take your data to another browser or computer.
settings.persistencePermissionHint1: When you click this button, your browser might ask you for permission.
settings.persistenceExportHint1: Persists your current data in a file for download.
settings.persistenceImportHint1: Choose an exported file and import your data. Caution: Your current data will be overwritten!
